duties_responsibilities.duty: Serve as a Client Executive to approximately two hundred multi-dwelling unit (MDU) communities.
Analyze data and strategically plan marketing activities to drive sales.
Coordinate events with property professionals and vendors.
Partner with cross-functional teams to resolve customer escalations.
Build and maintain relationships with property staff.
Create marketing plans to increase sales.
Pull sales data from Verizon systems.
Update documents in Excel, PowerPoint, and Google Sheets.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or four or more years of work experience.
